授業目的:
A KALEIDOSCOPE OF JAPANESE CINEMA
This course intends to introduce students to the fascinating variety of Japanese cinema through a number of films representing different genres, themes, and directors, including anime, and explore ways in which cinema offers a perspective into history, society, and culture.
到達目標: The main objective of this course is to help students deepen their understanding of Japanese cinema and provide them with a basic scholarship to discuss one of the world's most important film cultures.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
【合併】総合日本学習科目（映画論Ａ）（CIEC）/Japanese Cinema A（国際学部）
関連科目:
Classic Japanese Cinema

Traditional Japanese Theatre
Japanese culture, society, and history
Gender Perspectives in Japanese Cinema
Transmedia
授業方法:
Classes will be conducted face-to-face.
Every class will use materials and homework relevant to the week's lesson and contents together with explanations through .doc/ pdf / mp4 files.
The instructor will also provide relevant internet links for study and self-study.
Students will be required to prepare and submit homework through LUNA before a given deadline.
The instructor will be available for consultation through mail and LUNA to maximise students' understanding and performance.
Students can also contact the instructor at any other time through the mail and/or LUNA.
